title: Jordan Is Running Out of Water, a Grim Glimpse of the Future
description: The small Middle Eastern nation is already one of the driest countries in the world and rising heat, coupled with a growing population, is making things much worse.
dc:creator: Karen Zraick
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:credit: Laura Boushnak for The New York Times
media:description: Tourists swim at the Dead Sea in Jordan. The Dead Sea is a saltwater lake that is disappearing due to a confluence of factors that have been made worse by climate change.
